insert into bookmark (wordno, title, regDate, link, keyword, thumbnail, description, userno, bmkListNo ) values (null, #{title}, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') , #{link}, #{keyword}, #{thumbnail} , #{description}, #{userNo}, #{bmkListNo})
select last_insert_id()
mapper.select:
select count(wordNo) from bookmark
AND bmkListNo=#{bmkListNo}
AND userno = #{userNo} and (title like '%${keyword}%' or description like '%${keyword}%' or keyword like '%${keyword}%' )
AND userno = #{userNo} and keyword like '%${keyword}%'
AND userno = #{userNo} and (title like '%${keyword}%' or description like '%${keyword}%' )

select wordno, title, date_format(regDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDate, link, keyword, thumbnail, description , bmkListNo from bookmark where userno = #{userNo} order by wordNo desc limit #{startRow},#{showNum}

choose.when: select count(wordNo) from bookmark where userno = #{userNo} and (title like '%${keyword}%' or description like '%${keyword}%' or keyword like '%${keyword}%' )
select count(wordNo) from bookmark where userno = #{userNo} and keyword like '%${keyword}%'
choose.otherwise: select count(wordNo) from bookmark where userno = #{userNo} and (title like '%${keyword}%' or description like '%${keyword}%' )

choose.when: delete from bookmark where wordNo = #{wordNo} and userNo=#{userNo}
choose.otherwise: delete from bookmark where link=#{link} and userNo=#{userNo}
